iana.template_text:
Type name: application

Subtype name: ace+cbor

Required parameters: N/A

Optional parameters: N/A

Encoding considerations: Must be encoded as a CBOR map containing the
protocol parameters defined in RFC 9200.

Security considerations: See Section 6 of RFC 9200

Interoperability considerations: N/A

Published specification: RFC 9200

Applications that use this media type: The type is used by
authorization servers, clients, and resource servers that support the
ACE framework with CBOR encoding, as specified in RFC 9200.

Fragment identifier considerations: N/A

Additional information: N/A
